mapper.insert: insert into shopsetting( sellerId, shippingCountry, shippingPromiseDays, title, description, defaultCoinage, bankName, bankCity, bankAddress, swiftCode, accountName, accountNumber) values(#{sellerId}, #{shippingCountry}, #{shippingPromiseDays}, #{title}, #{description}, #{defaultCoinage}, #{bankName}, #{bankCity}, #{bankAddress}, #{swiftCode}, #{accountName}, #{accountNumber})
mapper.update: update shopsetting set shippingCountry = #{shippingCountry}, shippingPromiseDays = #{shippingPromiseDays}, title = #{title}, titleInChinese = #{titleInChinese}, description = #{description}, descriptionInChinese = #{descriptionInChinese}, defaultCoinage = #{defaultCoinage}, bankName = #{bankName}, bankCity = #{bankCity}, bankAddress = #{bankAddress}, swiftCode = #{swiftCode}, accountName = #{accountName}, accountNumber = #{accountNumber} where id = #{id}
update shopsetting set titleInChinese = #{titleInChinese}, descriptionInChinese = #{descriptionInChinese} where id = #{id}
